verses.english: By the dawn
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da alfijiri.

verses.english: And [by] ten nights
verses.hausa: Da darũruwa gõma.

verses.english: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
verses.hausa: Da (adadi na) cikã da (na) mãrã.

verses.english: And [by] the night when it passes,
verses.hausa: Da dare idan yana shũɗewa.

verses.arabic: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
verses.english: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
verses.hausa: Ko a cikin waɗannan akwai abin rantsuwa ga mai hankali (da yake kange shi daga zunubi)?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.english: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
verses.hausa: Ba ka ga yadda Ubangijinka Ya aikata da Ãdãwa ba?

verses.english: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
verses.hausa: Iramawa mãsu sakon ƙĩrar jiki.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
verses.english: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
verses.hausa: Waɗanda ba a halitta kwatankwacinsu ba a cikin garũruwa (na dũniya).

verses.english: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
verses.hausa: Da samũdãwa waɗanda suka fasa duwãtsu a cikin Wadi suka yi gidãje)?

verses.english: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
verses.hausa: Da Fir'auna mai turãku.

verses.english: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suka ƙẽtare iyãkarsu, a cikin garũruwa?

verses.english: And increased therein the corruption.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, suka yawaita yin ɓarna a cikinsu.

verses.english: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka Ubangijinka Ya zuba musu bũlãlar azãba.

verses.english: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Ubangijinka Yana nan a mafaka.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.english: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
verses.hausa: To, amma fa mutum idan Ubangijibsa Ya jarraba shi, wãto Yã girmama shi kuma Ya yi masa ni'ima, sai ya ce: "Ubangijina Ya girmama ni."

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ
verses.english: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan Ya jarraba shi, wãto Ya ƙuntata masa abincinsa, sai ya ce: "Ubangijina Ya walãkanta ni."

verses.english: No! But you do not honor the orphan
verses.hausa: A'aha! Bari wannan, ai bã ku girmama marãya!

verses.english: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
verses.hausa: Bã ku kwaɗaitã wa jũnanku ga (tattalin) abincin matalauci!

verses.english: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
verses.hausa: Kuma kuna cin dũkiyar gãdo, ci na tãrãwa.

verses.english: And you love wealth with immense love.
verses.hausa: Kuma kuna son dũkiya, so mai yawa.

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.english: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
verses.hausa: A'aha! Idan aka niƙa ƙasa niƙewa sosai.

verses.english: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
verses.hausa: Kuma Ubangijinka Ya zo, alhãli malã'iku na jẽre, safũ- safu.

verses.arabic: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.english: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
verses.hausa: Kuma a ranar nan aka zo da Jahannama. A ranar nan mutum zai yi tunãni. To, inã fa tunãni yake a gare shi!

verses.english: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
verses.hausa: Yana dinga cẽwa, "Kaitona, dã na gabatar (da aikin ƙwarai) domin rãyuwata!"

verses.english: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
verses.hausa: To, a rãnar nan bãbu wani mai yin azãba irin azãbar Allah.

verses.english: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
verses.hausa: Kuma bãbu wani mai ɗauri irin ɗaurinSa.

verses.english: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
verses.hausa: Yã kai rai mai natsuwa!

verses.english: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
verses.hausa: Ka koma zuwa ga Ubangijinka, alhãli kana mai yarda (da abin da Ya ƙaddara maka a dũniya) abar yardarwa (da sakamakon da zã a ba ka a Lãhira).

verses.english: And enter among My [righteous] servants
verses.hausa: Sabõbda haka, ka shiga cikin bãyiNa (mãsu bin umurui a dũniya).

verses.english: And enter My Paradise."
verses.hausa: Kuma ka shiga AljannaTa (a Lãhira).
